name.min: Course name must be at least 1 character
name.max: Course name must be at most 30 characters
name.unique: A course with this name already exists

course.groupRequired: At least one group must be added

name.min: Group name must be at least 1 character

name.unique: Group name already exists for this course

schedule.timeRange: All selected days must have a valid schedule

confirmClearAllCoursesDescription: This action cannot be undone. All courses will be removed from the list.
confirmDeleteCourse: Are you sure you want to delete this course?
confirmDeleteCourseDescription: This action cannot be undone. The course "{{itemName}}" will be removed from the list.
confirmDeleteGroup: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
confirmDeleteGroupDescription: This action cannot be undone. The group "{{itemName}}" will be removed from the course.

errorBoundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: We're sorry, an unexpected error has occurred. You can try reloading the page or go back to home.
